programmes.show_description: Martin Geissler hears about a spate of developments in the embezzlement case against ex-SNP chief executive Peter Murrell.
Joining Radio 5 Live.
News from across Scotland and the world, plus sport, weather, entertainment and big name interviews.
Stephen Jardine gets to the heart of the stories making the news.
News updates from Scotland and beyond, plus all your lunchtime sport, travel and weather.
Bryan Burnett brings you feel-good music and chat with celebrity guests.
Zara Janjua keeps you up to date on what's happening in the arts and culture scene across Scotland.
Breaking down the day's talking points with comment and opinion, plus sport, travel and weather.
Roddy Hart wants to hear about the treasured pop items you've held on to. Maybe it's prized ticket stubs from the Apollo, or did you catch a Rod Stewart football?
Full commentary of Celtic v Stuttgart in the Europa League play-off round (2000 KO).
The best company to end the day, with lively chat and some of your favourite tunes.
Martin Geissler and the team bring you thoughtful conversation and expert analysis covering the most interesting news stories in Scotland.

Des Clarke hosts Scotland's award-winning satirical news quiz.

New and classic cuts all played from 7', 12' and vinyl LPs. Grant shares the treasures from his own shopping adventures and discovers the stories about your record collections.
Phoebe I-H and Stephanie Cheape bring you their selection of new music coming out of Scotland today. WhatsApp the show - 08085 92 95 00.
